item.title: Audio Journaling
item.description: For quite some time now, I’ve been using Logseq as my personal knowledge management system. It has been an invaluable tool for organizing my thoughts, projects, and ideas. A few months ago, I decided to take it a step further by incorporating journaling into my daily routine. Each morning and evening, I reflect on how I’m feeling, what has moved me, what went well during the day, where I excelled, and where there might be room for improvement.
